messages2.text: NLT Life Application Study Bible offers 10,000 notes to challenge readers to apply the truths of Scripture to everyday life.  Also book introductions, maps, and personality profiles.

The CSB Study Bible includes an award-winning array of study resources including over 16,000 study notes, tools, word studies, and the updated 2020 Christian Standard Bible text to present the truth of Godâ€™s Word with accuracy and clarity for todayâ€™s readers.

Based on Dr. J. Vernon McGee's popular 5-year radio program, this commentary captures the core teaching topic from every book of the Bible.  Includes book introduction, outline and paragraph-by-paragraph studies through each chapter.

Do you enjoy "The Message" or "The Voice"? God longs to have his Word expressed in every language in a way that unlocks the passion of his heart. Try "The Passion Translation" which includes the New Testament, Psalms, Proverbs, and Song of Songs.

Check out our Black Friday - Cyber Monday Sale! Up to 65% off Study Bibles, Commentaries, Devotionals, Translations and more. Sale ends December 2nd, 2020 at 11:59pm PST.

Sale available only at tecartabible.com/store
